resource_dependency.carInventoryDataSchema: Database table named 'cars' with columns: id (UUID), make (string), model (string), year (integer), category (string), daily_rate (decimal), image_url (string), availability_status (boolean)

function: Display available car listings with images, descriptions, and pricing information.
static_description: A responsive grid layout displaying car cards with image (referenced via image_url), make, model, year, category, and daily rate. Background set to papaya whip (#FFEFD5) and components styled with dark orange (#FF8C00).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a car card navigates to the car details page.
On hover over a car card, a shadow effect appears around the card and the cursor changes to pointer.

resource_dependency.bookingFormValidationRules: Required fields: pickup date/time, return date/time, selected car ID. Date validation ensures return is after pickup.
resource_dependency.datePickerLibrary: Use react-datepicker or similar library for calendar UI.

function: Allow users to select rental period through intuitive date and time pickers.
static_description: Two labeled sections for 'Pickup' and 'Return', each containing date and time input fields rendered using date picker library. Submit button enabled only when all required fields are filled correctly.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on date field opens the calendar popup from the date picker library.
Upon selecting a date, it populates the respective input field and validates against business rules (e.g., return date cannot be before pickup).
Changing time updates the value in the corresponding time input field and revalidates the form.

resource_dependency.bookingConfirmationTemplate: HTML template showing booking summary including car info, dates, total cost, and confirmation number.
resource_dependency.bookingRecordStorageSchema: Table named 'bookings' with columns: id (UUID), user_id (foreign key to users.id), car_id (foreign key to cars.id), start_datetime (timestamp), end_datetime (timestamp), total_cost (decimal), status (enum: pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled)
resource_dependency.confirmationEmailService: Integration with email service to send booking confirmations.

function: Process user selections into a confirmed reservation and display confirmation.
static_description: After successful submission, displays a full-screen confirmation screen with booking ID, summary of selected car and dates, and estimated total cost. Includes links to manage booking and view history.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Manage Booking' redirects to the userâ€™s booking management section. Clicking 'Browse More Cars' returns to the main listing page.

resource_dependency.userAccountDataSchema: Users table with fields: id (UUID), name (string), email (unique string), password_hash (string), created_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.sessionManagementMechanism: JWT-based session tokens stored in HTTP-only cookies.

function: Enable secure login and registration for accessing personalized features.
static_description: Login/Register modal/form overlay with inputs for email, password, and optional name during registration. Papaya whip background with dark orange buttons and borders.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' or 'Register' submits credentials to backend. On success, closes modal and refreshes relevant parts of UI; on failure, shows error messages inline.
Focusing on an input highlights the border with dark orange color.

resource_dependency.paymentGatewayIntegrations: Supports Stripe for credit cards and PayPal Checkout SDK for PayPal transactions.
resource_dependency.transactionLoggingSchema: Payments table with columns: id (UUID), booking_id (foreign key to bookings.id), amount (decimal), method (enum: credit_card, paypal), status (enum: initiated, succeeded, failed), transaction_reference (string)

function: Facilitate secure payment collection using multiple supported gateways.
static_description: Embedded payment forms within checkout flow, dynamically loaded based on chosen payment method. Displays options like 'Credit Card' and 'PayPal'. Shows loading indicator while processing.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a payment option loads the appropriate form fields. Clicking 'Pay Now' initiates transaction with selected gateway and disables further clicks until response.
Submitting valid payment details triggers API call to process transaction and redirects to confirmation page upon success.

resource_dependency.orderDashboardLayout: Tabbed interface with views for active, past, and cancelled bookings.
resource_dependency.bookingStatusUpdateWebhook: Real-time status updates pushed from backend to frontend.

function: Provide administrators or users with tools to monitor and control existing reservations.
static_description: Dashboard panel showing tabbed navigation ('Active', 'Past', 'Cancelled') above a list of booking entries. Each entry includes car details, customer name (if admin), dates, current status, and action buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking tabs filters displayed bookings accordingly. Clicking 'Cancel' sends DELETE request to cancel endpoint and updates local state immediately.
Hovering over actions reveals tooltips explaining their function.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignFramework: CSS media queries and flexbox/grid layouts ensuring consistent look across devices.
resource_dependency.themeVariablesFile: :root CSS variables defining --background-color as #FFEFD5 and --primary-accent as #FF8C00.

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.
static_description: Entire application uses responsive units (rem/vw/vh/em) and media breakpoints to adjust layout density and font sizes. Maintains papaya whip background and dark orange accents consistently.

interaction_and_states.description: Adjusts column count in grids, hides/shows sidebars/menus, and scales touch targets appropriately without loss of functionality.
Smooth scrolling behavior maintained even when content exceeds viewport height.
